invocations.description: Returns a table containing the coordinates of the current lure location (.x, .y and .z).
invocations.ex:
local lure = getlurelocation()
local lurecoordinates = getobjectarea(lure.x, lure.y, lure.z)
setposition(0, 0)
drawtext('Lure', lurecoordinates.left, lurecoordinates.top)
invocations.exDescription: Will draw the text 'Lure' at the current lure coordinates' position.
